title: Wheel Barrow Assembly
description: A wheelbarrow is a simple tool used for carrying things. It has one wheel at the front and two handles at the back to push or pull it. People use wheelbarrows in places like construction sites, gardens, or farms to move heavy things like dirt, rocks, plants, or tools.

title: Rotor Motor Assembly
description: A rotor motor uses a rotating rotor and stationary stator to convert electrical energy into mechanical motion. Using SolidWorks, you can design, assemble, and simulate the motor components for various applications like electric vehicles and industrial machines.

title: Bending Roller Machine
description: This bending roller machine is designed in SolidWorks to bend sheet metal into curved shapes. It features precisely aligned rollers and a sturdy support frame for accurate metal forming. The model demonstrates key mechanical design concepts used in fabrication and manufacturing.

title: Roller Assembly
description: A roller is a cylindrical tool used to apply force or pressure, often for flattening, smoothing, or transporting materials. It is commonly used in contruction, printing, and material handling applications.
